comprehensive_overview: Intel oneAPI Deep Neural Network Library (DNNL) for CPU with Threading Building Blocks (TBB) support is a high-performance library for deep learning applications. It provides optimized building blocks for implementing deep neural networks on Intel CPUs.
core_features: 1. High-performance deep learning library optimized for Intel CPUs. 2. Supports various neural network models and operations. 3. Integration with Threading Building Blocks (TBB) for efficient multi-threading. 4. Provides primitives for deep learning acceleration on Intel CPUs.
